str2: From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
Never. From oude and pote; not even at any time, i.e. Never at all.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
Prophecy, prophesying; the gift of communicating and enforcing revealed truth. From prophetes; prediction.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From kata and argeo; to be entirely idle, literally or figuratively.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
The tongue; by implication, a language.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to stop, i.e. Restrain, quit, desist, come to an end.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
Knowledge, doctrine, wisdom. From ginosko; knowing, i.e. knowledge.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and argeo; to be entirely idle, literally or figuratively.
